title: Feign Death
content:
ecromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Feign Death Information

Description: Put an ally in a protective coma. They become Resistant to all damage types except for Psychic. Disease and poison have no effect. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Necromancy School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: N/A
